title: Fitness Center, Laundry rooms with full-size GE Washers and Dryers
map_address: 18179 W. Terra Verde Place near Lost Canyon
posting_body: ['Self-Guided Onsite Tours Now Available!', 'At this time our team is available to schedule a self-guided onsite tour after a personalized virtual tour has been taken.', 'Please call us for more information!', 'Welcome to Townhomes at Lost Canyon', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 30', 'OR Text', '30', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1436 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'An all-new community for families and commuters alike, The Townhomes at Lost Canyon offer luxury townhouse-style living at a relaxed Santa Clarita Valley pace.', 'While at home, residents will enjoy a resort-like experience with access to world-class amenities.', 'The resort-style pool, and spa give new definition to lazy Sunday afternoons and evening stress relief.', 'The conveniently located pool lounge, barbecue area, playground, and dog park make entertaining a breeze.', '*', 'Townhomes will showcase spacious 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath floorplans with attached 2-car garages and high-end finishes, including designer wood plank flooring on the first level and walk-in laundry rooms on the second level.', 'The kitchens will evoke a chef-like ambiance with features including European-style, flat, panel cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and quartz counter tops.', 'Select townhomes will offer mountain views, an over-sized patio with outdoor fireplaces and a second private patio.', 'Features:', 'Metroflor walnut plank flooring, European-style cabinetry in a chocolate finish with stainless steel bar pulls, Classic multi-speed ceiling fans in living rooms, GE cleansteel appliances, Quartz counters and backsplashes, Double-basin stainless steel sinks, Fireplace courtyards*, Gallery-style track lighting with spotlights in dining rooms, Laundry rooms with full-size GE Washers and Dryers, Plush desert tan carpeting in bedrooms, Lofts*, Private master bedroom with Walk-in closets, Spacious private patios*, Direct-access two-car garages with remote control entry, Italian-style glazed porcelain floor tile, Moen gooseneck faucets, Ample closet space, Separate shower and tub in master bathrooms, Microwave', 'Community Amenities:', 'Six-way adjustable weight bench, Gated community entrance, Gas barbecue grills, Poolside chaise lounges, Covered lounging cabana with flat screen TVs, Outdoor sofa and club chairs, Centralized utilities set-up, Heated swimming pool, Whirlpool spa, Free weight, medicine ball and yoga mat selections, Online rent payment and service requests, Dining tables with café-style canvas umbrellas, Cardio machines, Dog Park with clean-up station, Remote office workstations, Shaded outdoor play area, Fitness Center, Access control system with key fob controls', 'Pet Policy', 'Breed
